entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add 2 more constructors to ConcurrentDictionary class #77948
  • MONO_WASM: Error in mono_download_assets: RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #77946
  • Stopwatch.GetTimestamp() doesn't take into account sleep time on Unix #77945
  • GetAllNetworkInterfaces throws on Success on Android .NET 6 #77938
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializerOptions.UseZeroByteReads #77935

Closed

  • CI build failure: mono llvmfullaot linux x64 - No output #77403
  • Vector128.AndNot is broken #77942
    8.0.0
  • DllImport in Linux, can't call native function when so library is compile in '-fPIC' option. #77941
  • Rename Directory.CreateDirectory to Directory.Create to be consistent with File API #77919
  • Idea: throw when an ILGenerator.Emit method overload is used with an invalid opcode. #40620
    Future
  • Possible optimization opportunity of integer multiplication by constant #75119
    Future
  • SuperFileCheck causes runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools prebuilt in source builds #77920
  • Consider extending the functionality of the PEReader class #35691
    Future
  • MetadataReader.GetMethodDefinition throws `BadImageFormatException` -- should potentially return null on failure? #48167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't use IsMatchingConst in Tier0 #77949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize String.Equals for OrdinalIgnoreCase #77947
    area-System.Globalization
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Correctly handle false on Add/Take from underlying collection in BlockingCollection #77936
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable software writewatch and card bundles on Windows. #77934
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Readme.md for Resources, Threading.Tasks, Threading.Channels, ComilerServices, Configuration and CodeDom assemblies #77932
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix rerunning crossgen2 tests #77903
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize XxHash3 on ARM platform #77881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Switch custom attribute hash from using CClosedHashEx to SHash #77933
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools for source build #77928
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Make DAC logging opt-in #77923
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` and `a % -1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Optimize (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
